channel.title: collecting on this is bad art
channel.description: Recent content in collecting on this is bad art

item.description: how it feels to collect you: (I have been trying to reframe some of my language from “archiving” to “collecting,” as I believe that it is more accurate. Archiving implies a method of organization and an attention to certain information that I am currently disregarding.) like a betrayal of your current self, the you who is not reading this right now, the “future you” to whom you wrote as a despairing high school sophomore like re-committing my love to you, both in the past and in the present like delaying our reunion.
